::Spears::

She nodded in agreement with Striker. "Yes, perhaps they will have a 
shuttle we could borrow." she sighed a deep sigh,"I have to agree, 
the hull of the Ark won't make it I'm afraid."

She looked around the room, feeling a little depressed over all  the 
destruction.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods. "The parts could be usefull, but there's an easier 
way of 
> getting them. The Cybertronian Fire is a battle cruiser, it might 
have a 
> space-worthy shuttle or two."
> 
> He looks around, "Either way, I doubt the hull of the Ark would 
hold."
